critique: The document is an executive order focused on reducing administrative costs within federal agencies. It mandates specific reductions in administrative expenses for executive departments and agencies from fiscal years 1994 through 1997, relative to a 1993 baseline. The order empowers the Director of the OMB to enforce these reductions and encourages independent regulatory commissions and agencies to comply. There is no discussion of immigration, civil liberties, or diversity. The focus is strictly on fiscal austerity and government efficiency.
